sprint_goal: Establish the foundational, isolated network and Kubernetes infrastructure for all environments to enable future service deployments.
Provision all persistent data stores and establish the complete CI/CD pipeline to automate quality checks and deployments.
Implement the core registration and login flows for all three user roles (Customer, Vendor, Rider), establishing the foundation for user access.
Build foundational management features: customers can add addresses, vendors can manage hours and products, riders can set availability, and customers can add items to a cart.
Implement the critical end-to-end order flow: customer order placement/payment and the core rider allocation/re-assignment logic.
Enhance the order flow with customer-facing live tracking, rider Proof of Delivery, and a resilient payment processing and reconciliation system.
Establish critical operational capabilities: automated partner payouts, comprehensive admin management tools, and the full platform observability stack.
